positions.title: Oracle and SQL Server DBA/Sytem Adminstration and principal data analyst.
GRADUATED, MSIT
positions.description: Graduated from CUA, Class of 2013 MSHIT

given.text:
Rajeev was my manager during my tenure at Allen Bates Technologies. Rajeev has a unique combination of people and technical management skills. He was an inspiring mentor for the whole team and go-to person for conflict resolution, problem solving, requirement clarification or any thing else. Rajeev has strong interpersonal skills as well as he is dedicated, ambitious, result driven leader and thoughtful individual. On personal side, I have learned a lot from Rajeev and would love to work with him again in the future. I highly recommend Rajeev for any management role.
…
